title: my league starts in a really small window
body: whenever i start a match the game is sooo in a small window and i have to maximize from the game settings , anyone knows how to fix this ?

replies.body:
If you're constantly having to readjust your settings in-game without it saving, then a corrupt config could be preventing it from saving to our server.  Resetting your config should help with this!

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that does the trick for you.
Thanks , That worked like magic , appreciate the quick response , have a great day
